name: A Duck Loves Bread
description:
A Duck Loves Bread is a Kaizo-inspired game created with the Godot Engine that was designed to be beaten in under 10 minutes.

You play as the duck, who is on a journey through bright hillsides, deep dark caves, and creepy dungeons on his way to reach... the super market, where he can get a loaf of bread. You will face peril, difficult platforms, and a final showdown with the one and only, Smacky the Frog.

I develop on Twitch and play games for fun. If you are persuaded to, please feel free to follow, subscribe, and or donate there.

Thank you for your interest in A Duck Loves Bread!
